definitions.definition: Any of many plants with thorny stems growing in dense clusters, such as many in the Rosa , Rubus , and Smilax genera
( figurative ) Anything sharp or unpleasant to the feelings.

main_definition: Any of many plants with thorny stems growing in dense clusters, such as many in the Rosa , Rubus , and Smilax genera
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Anything sharp or unpleasant to the feelings.

definitions.definition: White heath ( Erica arborea ), a thorny Mediterranean shrub .
A pipe for smoking, made from the roots of that shrub.

main_definition: White heath ( Erica arborea ), a thorny Mediterranean shrub .
secondary_definitions: A pipe for smoking, made from the roots of that shrub.
